description.raw:
This pull request is mainly some refactoring to remove duplicate code (net ~380 lines removed):

* Replace repeated try/catch blocks in `ODEJoint::[GS]etParam` and `ODEUniversalJoint::[GS]etParam` with a single try/catch block that contains all the if/else if logic.
* Also replace some if blocks that check the axis index with a bit-wise AND with a `group` bitmask variable (introduced in pull request #1221 for "friction" parameter, extended to other parameters here).
* `Joint::Load`: read axis parameters in loop instead of duplicate code blocks.

Also, I threw in some test expectations for `GetParam("hi_stop")` and `GetParam("lo_stop")` to `INTEGRATION_joint_spawn`. This required some added code in `BulletJoint::GetParam`.

I also removed the private member variable `Link::scale`, since this was shadowing the protected `Entity::scale` and was un-needed.

I also noticed that the joint friction value wasn't set properly in `Joint::FillMsg`, so I updated that as well (11ec88e7ce01).

* [Jenkins build](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/290/)
description.html:
This pull request is mainly some refactoring to remove duplicate code (net ~380 lines removed):

  • Replace repeated try/catch blocks in ODEJoint::[GS]etParam and ODEUniversalJoint::[GS]etParam with a single try/catch block that contains all the if/else if logic.
  • Also replace some if blocks that check the axis index with a bit-wise AND with a group bitmask variable (introduced in pull request #1221 for "friction" parameter, extended to other parameters here).
  • Joint::Load: read axis parameters in loop instead of duplicate code blocks.

Also, I threw in some test expectations for GetParam("hi_stop") and GetParam("lo_stop") to INTEGRATION_joint_spawn. This required some added code in BulletJoint::GetParam.

I also removed the private member variable Link::scale, since this was shadowing the protected Entity::scale and was un-needed.

I also noticed that the joint friction value wasn't set properly in Joint::FillMsg, so I updated that as well (11ec88e7ce01).

  • Jenkins build
